The epitome of man's duty being a discourse upon Mic. 6.8, where hypocritical people are briefly directed how to please God. Patrick, Simon, 1626-1707.
[2], 131 p.
Printed by R.W. for Francis Tyton ..., London : 1660.
Imperfect: tightly boudn, with print show-through and slight loss of print. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
